attributes.action: Impeach * British Politicians For Implementing (Staying In The E.U. Policy).
attributes.additional_details: We the People of The U.K. want a Brexit from The E.U. thus allowing back to us " Full British Government Sovereign powers & the Ability to control our Own Borders once again " we cannot believe that any British Politician would be against this policy.
attributes.background: Under The Magna Carta " Our Ancestors wrote this - so That the British people would always be free from External Rulers.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept a petition calling for the impeachment of politicians because this procedure is now considered obsolete. It is not therefore clear what action could be taken on this petition. 
 
This note explains the history of impeachment and the current position: 

https://researchbriefings.intranet.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/SN02666#fullreport
 
If you are concerned about Government policy, you could start a petition about specific policies that concern you.
